description: The MODIS Aqua Global Level 3 Mapped mid-IR Sea surface temperature (SST) product consists of sea surface temperature (SST) data that are derived from the NASA MODIS sensor on board the Aqua satellite. For this particular product the SST is derived from the 3.8-4.1 um mid-IR infrared (IR) bands (MODIS channels 20, 22, and 23).  The data have been mapped to a cylindrical equidistant map projection with 4.63 or 9.26 km spatial bins. The temporal resolution is daily, weekly (8 day), monthly or annual. The file format for all data is HDF version 4.
keywords: OCEANS | OCEAN TEMPERATURE | SEA SURFACE TEMPERATURE
name: GCLME: Sea surface temperature, MODIS Aqua Global Level 3 Mapped Mid-IR SST (May)
